title: A Soldier's Dream - Sokurov 1995
description:
This is my first upload so I figured I\\\\\\\&#039;d start small with a twelve minute short film from Alexander Sokurov. There\\\\\\\&#039;s no spoken dialogue so language and texted languages don\\\\\\\&#039;t really apply except for the opening credits. I\\\\\\\&#039;ve got some other Sokurov I will upload in time and other films as well, including Yasujiro Ozu, Seijun Suzuki, Kenji Fukasaku, a Jan Nemec, Mikio Naruse, Pier Paulo Pasolini, and others once I search through my movie files. Let me know if you guys are interested in any of these. ONly catch is that they will all have eng hardsubs.

Enjoy!
